Вызов уведомления об успешном выполнении действия

| script |
| ensure | do | click | on | text=Показать уведомление об успешном* |
| ensure | do | waitForVisible | on | css=div.ndm-notification__body-msg--valigned |
| $text= | is | storeText | on | css=div.ndm-notification__body-msg--valigned > span.ng-scope.ng-binding > span.ng-scope |
| ensure | do | verifyEval | on | "$text"=="success!" | with | true |
